movies.title: The Hateful Eight
movies.synopsis: While racing toward the town of Red Rock in post-Civil War Wyoming, bounty hunter John 'The Hangman' Ruth (Kurt Russell) and his fugitive prisoner (Jennifer Jason Leigh) encounter another bounty hunter (Samuel L. Jackson) and a man who claims to be a sheriff. Hoping to find shelter from a blizzard, the group travels to a stagecoach stopover located on a mountain pass. Greeted there by four strangers, the eight travelers soon learn that they may not make it to their destination after all
